graph_title: Pérdidas económicas directas atribuidas a los desastres en relación con el producto interno bruto (PIB) mundial
indicator_name: Pérdidas económicas directas atribuidas a los desastres en relación con el producto interno bruto (PIB) mundial
SDG_GOAL: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET: Target 1.5: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure  and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 1.5.2: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters in relation to global gross domestic product (GDP) - modified by state
STAT_CONC_DEF:
## Limitations:
The economic loss is not reported by city so had to be modified to report by state. The data is also not reported in relation to GDP so it is reported in  millions in 100k.
